translations: adj.学术的，学术性的；博学的，勤奋好学的

sentences.sentence: He was an intellectual, scholarly man.
sentences.translation: 他是一个聪明博学的人。

sentences.sentence: This has been the subject of intense scholarly debate.
sentences.translation: 这一直是学术讨论的热门话题。

sentences.sentence: His revolutionary work in linguistics has aroused intense scholarly interest.
sentences.translation: 他在语言学方面的革命性著作引起了强烈的学术兴趣。
